priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Microscopic Findings Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C132263

self.title: CDISC SDTM Microscopic Findings Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test codes concerned with the clinical findings from a specimen that are visible by microscopic analysis.
name: SDTM Microscopic Findings Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Microscopic Findings Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: A measurement of the abnormal cells in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the ALK receptor tyrosine kinase in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the alpha-methylacyl coenzyme A racemase in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of the arteriolar hyaline thickening of vessels in a biological specimen.
The histologic evaluation and diagnosis of the type of renal allograft rejection based on kidney biopsies and the Banff Working Classification from the Banff Foundation for Allograft Pathology. (NCI)
A measurement of the beta-defensin 1 in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the beta-defensin 2 in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the bradykinin receptor B1 in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of the blood vessel density in a biological specimen.
A measurement of BRCA1 protein in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Breast Cancer Type 1 Susceptibility Protein Measurement

terms.definition: A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the neoplastic cells to total cells in a biological specimen.
A count of the CD3 expressing cells per unit in a biological specimen.
A count of the CD4 expressing cells per unit in a biological specimen.
A count of the CD68 expressing cells per unit in a biological specimen.
A count of the CD8 expressing cells per unit in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the CDX2 antigen in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of cellular maturity and specialization in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the total number of core biopsies that contain malignant tissue. (NCI)
A measurement of the cytokeratin 16 in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the dendritic cell-lysosomal-associated membrane protein in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Dendritic Cell Lysosomal-Associated Membrane Protein Measurement

terms.definition: A measurement of the EGFR protein with a specified variation(s) (mutations, deletions, insertions, etc.) in a biological specimen.
A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the intact epithelial reticular basement membrane length to the total epithelial reticular basement membrane length in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Intact Epithelial Reticular Basement Membrane Length to Total Epithelial Reticular Basement Membrane Length Ratio Measurement
synonyms: Epi RBM Lngth, Intact/Epi RBM Lngth, Tot
Epithelial RBM Length, Intact/Epithelial RBM Length, Total

terms.definition: A measurement of estrogen receptor protein in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of fibrosis in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the folate hydrolase 1 in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of glomerulitis in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of glomerulopathy in a biological specimen.
A measurement of HER2 protein in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 Measurement

terms.definition: The determination of the histologic type of cancer in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the intraepidermal nerve fiber density in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of intimal arteritis in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of interstitial fibrosis in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the Ki-67 protein in a biological specimen.
A measurement of lipocalin-2 in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of lymphatic invasion in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of mononuclear cell interstitial inflammation in a biological specimen.
An assessment by microscope (e.g., light, electron, confocal, etc.).
A measurement of the cells containing mitotic figures in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the MLH1 mismatch repair protein in a biological specimen.
The determination of the meaning of protein expression assessments across multiple mismatch repair proteins.
A measurement of the MSH2 mismatch repair protein in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the MSH6 mismatch repair protein in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of mesangial matrix in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of myelofibrosis in a biological specimen.
A measurement of NK2 homeobox 1 protein in a biological specimen.
A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the normal cells to total cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Normal Cell to Total Cell Ratio Measurement

terms.definition: A measurement of the prostatic acid phosphatase in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the PAX3-FKHR fusion protein in a biological specimen.
A relative measurement (percentage) of in situ component present in a carcinoma compared to the entire malignant cellular proliferation. (NCI)
A measurement of the programmed death ligand 1 in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the platelet and endothelial cell adhesion molecule 1 in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Platelet Endothelial Cell Adhesion Molecule 1 Measurement
synonyms: Platelet And Endothelial Cell Adhesion Molecule 1

terms.definition: A measurement of the PMS2 mismatch repair protein in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of perineural invasion in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the total number of cells that stain positively in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the progesterone receptor protein in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of peritubular capillaritis in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the phosphatase and tensin homolog in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the ROS proto-oncogene 1 protein in a biological specimen.
A measurement of the S100 calcium binding protein A7 in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: S100 Calcium Binding Protein A7 Measurement

terms.definition: The determination of the presence of actual or potential neoplastic tissue which has been left outside the boundary of a resected specimen within the patient. (NCI)
A measurement of the total smooth muscle antibody in a biological specimen.
A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the stromal cells to total cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Stromal Cell to Total Cell Ratio Measurement

terms.definition: The dimension between two surfaces of an object, usually the smallest dimension as opposed to the width or the length.
A measurement of the tumor cells in a biological specimen.
A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the transitional cells to the tumor cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Transitional Cell to Tumor Cell Ratio Measurement

terms.definition: An evaluation of tubular atrophy in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of tubulitis in a biological specimen.
A relative measurement (ratio or percentage) of the tumor cells to total cells in a biological specimen.
terms.preferredTerm: Tumor Cell to Total Cell Ratio Measurement

terms.definition: An evaluation of vascular invasion in a biological specimen.
An evaluation of the fibrointimal thickening of vessels in a biological specimen.
